Add pandas dependency for CSV processing

agent_handoff.handoff_notes: b.20 Data Integration SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETED. CSV polls import and audio upload system implemented with full integration to normalized tables. User-friendly interface created for easy data import. Ready for Testing Agent validation.
